entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 1:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: WNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4 except zero in a few localities.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain over northeastern sections early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4 except zero in a few localities. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:24 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:24 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:24 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
